verses.verse: וּבֶן־ הֲדַ֣ד <S%H1130><s%> And Benhadad מֶֽלֶךְ־ <S%H4428><s%> the king אֲרָ֗ם <S%H758><s%> of Syria קָבַץ֙ <S%H6908><s%> together אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all חֵיל֔וֹ <S%H2426><s%> army וּשְׁלֹשִׁ֨ים <S%H7970><s%> and [there were] thirty וּשְׁנַ֥יִם <S%H8147><s%> and two מֶ֛לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> kings אִתּ֖וֹ <S%H854><s%> for וְס֣וּס <S%H5483><s%> with him and horses וָרָ֑כֶב <S%H7393><s%> and chariots וַיַּ֗עַל <S%H5927><s%> and he went up וַיָּ֙צַר֙ <S%H6696><s%> and besieged עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and שֹׁ֣מְר֔וֹן <S%H8111><s%> Samaria וַיִּלָּ֖חֶם <S%H3898><s%> and warred בָּֽהּ׃

וַיִּשְׁלַ֧ח <S%H7971><s%> And he sent מַלְאָכִ֛ים <S%H4397><s%> messengers אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to אַחְאָ֥ב <S%H256><s%> to Ahab מֶֽלֶךְ־ <S%H4428><s%> king יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel הָעִֽירָה׃ <S%H5892><s%> into the city

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> answer ל֗וֹ כֹּ֚ה <S%H3541><s%> such אָמַ֣ר <S%H559><s%> answer בֶּן־ הֲדַ֔ד <S%H1130><s%> Ben-hadad כַּסְפְּךָ֥ <S%H3701><s%> Thy silver וּֽזְהָבְךָ֖ <S%H2091><s%> and thy gold לִֽי־ ה֑וּא <S%H1931><s%> he וְנָשֶׁ֧יךָ <S%H802><s%> [is] mine thy wives וּבָנֶ֛יךָ <S%H1121><s%> also and thy children הַטּוֹבִ֖ים <S%H2896><s%> [even] the goodliest לִי־ הֵֽם׃ <S%H1992><s%> like

וַיַּ֤עַן <S%H6030><s%> answered מֶֽלֶךְ־ <S%H4428><s%> And the king יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <S%H3478><s%> of Israel וַיֹּ֔אמֶר <S%H559><s%> and said כִּדְבָרְךָ֖ <S%H1697><s%> according to thy saying אֲדֹנִ֣י <S%H113><s%> My lord הַמֶּ֑לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> O king לְךָ֥ אֲנִ֖י <S%H589><s%> I am וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> after לִֽי׃

וַיָּשֻׁ֙בוּ֙ <S%H7725><s%> came again הַמַּלְאָכִ֔ים <S%H4397><s%> And the messengers וַיֹּ֣אמְר֔וּ <S%H559><s%> and said כֹּֽה־ <S%H3541><s%> Thus אָמַ֥ר <S%H559><s%> Thus speaketh בֶּן־ הֲדַ֖ד <S%H1130><s%> Benhadad לֵאמֹ֑ר <S%H559><s%> saying כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> Surely שָׁלַ֤חְתִּי <S%H7971><s%> Although I have sent אֵלֶ֙יךָ֙ <S%H413><s%> to you לֵאמֹ֔ר <S%H559><s%> unto thee saying כַּסְפְּךָ֧ <S%H3701><s%> me thy silver וּזְהָבְךָ֛ <S%H2091><s%> and thy gold וְנָשֶׁ֥יךָ <S%H802><s%> and thy wives וּבָנֶ֖יךָ <S%H1121><s%> and thy children לִ֥י תִתֵּֽן׃ <S%H5414><s%> Thou shalt deliver

כִּ֣י ׀ <S%H3588><s%> for אִם־ <S%H518><s%> but כָּעֵ֣ת <S%H6256><s%> about this time מָחָ֗ר <S%H4279><s%> unto thee to morrow אֶשְׁלַ֤ח <S%H7971><s%> Yet I will send אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> עֲבָדַי֙ <S%H5650><s%> my servants אֵלֶ֔יךָ <S%H413><s%> to you וְחִפְּשׂוּ֙ <S%H2664><s%> and they shall search אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בֵּ֣יתְךָ֔ <S%H1004><s%> thine house וְאֵ֖ת <S%H853><s%> בָּתֵּ֣י <S%H1004><s%> and the houses עֲבָדֶ֑יךָ <S%H5650><s%> of thy servants וְהָיָה֙ <S%H1961><s%> and it shall be כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> and whatever מַחְמַ֣ד <S%H4261><s%> [that] whatsoever is pleasant עֵינֶ֔יךָ <S%H5869><s%> in thine eyes יָשִׂ֥ימוּ <S%H7760><s%> they shall put בְיָדָ֖ם <S%H3027><s%> [it] in their hand וְלָקָֽחוּ׃ <S%H3947><s%> and take [it] away

וַיִּקְרָ֤א <S%H7121><s%> called מֶֽלֶךְ־ <S%H4428><s%> Then the king יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <S%H3478><s%> of Israel לְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all זִקְנֵ֣י <S%H2205><s%> all the elders הָאָ֔רֶץ <S%H776><s%> of the land וַיֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <S%H559><s%> and said דְּעֽוּ־ <S%H3045><s%> Mark נָ֣א <S%H4994><s%> Please וּרְא֔וּ <S%H7200><s%> I pray you and see כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> how רָעָ֖ה <S%H7451><s%> mischief זֶ֣ה <S%H2088><s%> this מְבַקֵּ֑שׁ <S%H1245><s%> how this [man] seeketh כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> how שָׁלַ֨ח <S%H7971><s%> for he sent אֵלַ֜י <S%H413><s%> to me לְנָשַׁ֤י <S%H802><s%> unto me for my wives וּלְבָנַי֙ <S%H1121><s%> and for my children וּלְכַסְפִּ֣י <S%H3701><s%> and for my silver וְלִזְהָבִ֔י <S%H2091><s%> and for my gold וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> did not מָנַ֖עְתִּי <S%H4513><s%> and I denied מִמֶּֽנּוּ׃ <S%H4480><s%> at

וַיֹּאמְר֥וּ <S%H559><s%> said אֵלָ֛יו <S%H413><s%> about כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> All הַזְּקֵנִ֖ים <S%H2205><s%> And all the elders וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all הָעָ֑ם <S%H5971><s%> and all the people אַל־ <S%H408><s%> not תִּשְׁמַ֖ע <S%H8085><s%> unto him Hearken וְל֥וֹא <S%H3808><s%> or תֹאבֶֽה׃ <S%H14><s%> not [unto him] nor consent

וַיֹּ֜אמֶר <S%H559><s%> Wherefore he said לְמַלְאֲכֵ֣י <S%H4397><s%> unto the messengers בֶן־ הֲדַ֗ד <S%H1130><s%> of Benhadad אִמְר֞וּ <S%H559><s%> Tell לַֽאדֹנִ֤י <S%H113><s%> my lord הַמֶּ֙לֶךְ֙ <S%H4428><s%> the king כֹּל֩ <S%H3605><s%> All אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> you שָׁלַ֨חְתָּ <S%H7971><s%> All that thou didst send אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to עַבְדְּךָ֤ <S%H5650><s%> for to thy servant בָרִֽאשֹׁנָה֙ <S%H7223><s%> at the first אֶעֱשֶׂ֔ה <S%H6213><s%> I will do וְהַדָּבָ֣ר <S%H1697><s%> but this thing הַזֶּ֔ה <S%H2088><s%> this לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> not אוּכַ֖ל <S%H3201><s%> I may לַעֲשׂ֑וֹת <S%H6213><s%> not do וַיֵּֽלְכוּ֙ <S%H1980><s%> departed הַמַּלְאָכִ֔ים <S%H4397><s%> And the messengers וַיְשִׁבֻ֖הוּ <S%H7725><s%> again דָּבָֽר׃ <S%H1697><s%> him word

וַיִּשְׁלַ֤ח <S%H7971><s%> sent אֵלָיו֙ <S%H413><s%> about בֶּן־ הֲדַ֔ד <S%H1130><s%> And Benhadad וַיֹּ֕אמֶר <S%H559><s%> unto him and said כֹּֽה־ <S%H3541><s%> so יַעֲשׂ֥וּן <S%H6213><s%> do so לִ֛י אֱלֹהִ֖ים <S%H430><s%> The gods וְכֹ֣ה <S%H3541><s%> also יוֹסִ֑פוּ <S%H3254><s%> unto me and more also אִם־ <S%H518><s%> if יִשְׂפֹּק֙ <S%H5606><s%> shall suffice עֲפַ֣ר <S%H6083><s%> if the dust שֹׁמְר֔וֹן <S%H8111><s%> of Samaria לִשְׁעָלִ֕ים <S%H8168><s%> for handfuls לְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> for all הָעָ֖ם <S%H5971><s%> for all the people אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> who בְּרַגְלָֽי׃ <S%H7272><s%> that follow

וַיַּ֤עַן <S%H6030><s%> answered מֶֽלֶךְ־ <S%H4428><s%> And the king יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <S%H3478><s%> of Israel וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> and said דַּבְּר֔וּ <S%H1696><s%> Tell אַל־ <S%H408><s%> nay יִתְהַלֵּ֥ל <S%H1984><s%> on [his harness] boast חֹגֵ֖ר <S%H2296><s%> [him] Let not him that girdeth כִּמְפַתֵּֽחַ׃ <S%H6605><s%> himself as he that putteth it off

וַיְהִ֗י <S%H1961><s%> become כִּשְׁמֹ֙עַ֙ <S%H8085><s%> And it came to pass when [Benhadad] heard אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַדָּבָ֣ר <S%H1697><s%> this message הַזֶּ֔ה <S%H2088><s%> this וְה֥וּא <S%H1931><s%> he שֹׁתֶ֛ה <S%H8354><s%> as he [was] drinking ה֥וּא <S%H1931><s%> he וְהַמְּלָכִ֖ים <S%H4428><s%> he and the kings בַּסֻּכּ֑וֹת <S%H5521><s%> in the pavilions וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <S%H559><s%> that he said אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to his עֲבָדָיו֙ <S%H5650><s%> unto his servants שִׂ֔ימוּ <S%H7760><s%> Set וַיָּשִׂ֖ימוּ <S%H7760><s%> [yourselves in array] And they set עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> against הָעִֽיר׃ <S%H5892><s%> [themselves in array] against the city

וְהִנֵּ֣ה ׀ <S%H2009><s%> now behold נָבִ֣יא <S%H5030><s%> prophet אֶחָ֗ד <S%H259><s%> a נִגַּשׁ֮ <S%H5066><s%> And behold there came אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about אַחְאָ֣ב <S%H256><s%> unto Ahab מֶֽלֶךְ־ <S%H4428><s%> king יִשְׂרָאֵל֒ <S%H3478><s%> of Israel וַיֹּ֗אמֶר <S%H559><s%> saying כֹּ֚ה <S%H3541><s%> Thus אָמַ֣ר <S%H559><s%> Thus saith יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD הְֽרָאִ֔יתָ <S%H7200><s%> Hast thou seen אֵ֛ת <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הֶהָמ֥וֹן <S%H1995><s%> abundance הַגָּד֖וֹל <S%H1419><s%> all this great הַזֶּ֑ה <S%H2088><s%> this הִנְנִ֨י <S%H2005><s%> behold נֹתְנ֤וֹ <S%H5414><s%> will deliver בְיָֽדְךָ֙ <S%H3027><s%> it into thine hand הַיּ֔וֹם <S%H3117><s%> this day וְיָדַעְתָּ֖ <S%H3045><s%> and thou shalt know כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for אֲנִ֥י <S%H589><s%> I יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> that I [am] the LORD

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said אַחְאָב֙ <S%H256><s%> And Ahab בְּמִ֔י <S%H4310><s%> Who וַיֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <S%H559><s%> By whom? And he said כֹּֽה־ <S%H3541><s%> Thus אָמַ֣ר <S%H559><s%> Thus saith יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD בְּנַעֲרֵ֖י <S%H5288><s%> [Even] by the young men שָׂרֵ֣י <S%H8269><s%> of the princes הַמְּדִינ֑וֹת <S%H4082><s%> of the provinces וַיֹּ֛אמֶר <S%H559><s%> Then he said מִֽי־ <S%H4310><s%> Who יֶאְסֹ֥ר <S%H631><s%> Who shall order הַמִּלְחָמָ֖ה <S%H4421><s%> battle וַיֹּ֥אמֶר <S%H559><s%> says אָֽתָּה׃ <S%H859><s%> he

וַיִּפְקֹ֗ד <S%H6485><s%> Then he numbered אֶֽת־ <S%H853><s%> נַעֲרֵי֙ <S%H5288><s%> the young men שָׂרֵ֣י <S%H8269><s%> of the princes הַמְּדִינ֔וֹת <S%H4082><s%> of the provinces וַיִּהְי֕וּ <S%H1961><s%> become מָאתַ֖יִם <S%H3967><s%> hundred שְׁנַ֣יִם <S%H8147><s%> and they were two וּשְׁלֹשִׁ֑ים <S%H7970><s%> and thirty וְאַחֲרֵיהֶ֗ם <S%H310><s%> and after פָּקַ֧ד <S%H6485><s%> them he numbered אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הָעָ֛ם <S%H5971><s%> all the people כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all בְּנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> [even] all the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel שִׁבְעַ֥ת <S%H7651><s%> [being] seven אֲלָפִֽים׃ <S%H505><s%> thousand

וַיֵּצְא֖וּ <S%H3318><s%> And they went out בַּֽצָּהֳרָ֑יִם <S%H6672><s%> at noon וּבֶן־ הֲדַד֩ <S%H1130><s%> But Benhadad שֹׁתֶ֨ה <S%H8354><s%> [was] drinking שִׁכּ֜וֹר <S%H7910><s%> himself drunk בַּסֻּכּ֗וֹת <S%H5521><s%> in the pavilions ה֧וּא <S%H1931><s%> he וְהַמְּלָכִ֛ים <S%H4428><s%> he and the kings שְׁלֹשִֽׁים־ <S%H7970><s%> the thirty וּשְׁנַ֥יִם <S%H8147><s%> and two מֶ֖לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> kings עֹזֵ֥ר <S%H5826><s%> that helped אֹתֽוֹ׃ <S%H853><s%>

וַיֵּצְא֗וּ <S%H3318><s%> went out נַעֲרֵ֛י <S%H5288><s%> And the young men שָׂרֵ֥י <S%H8269><s%> of the princes הַמְּדִינ֖וֹת <S%H4082><s%> of the provinces בָּרִֽאשֹׁנָ֑ה <S%H7223><s%> first וַיִּשְׁלַ֣ח <S%H7971><s%> sent out בֶּן־ הֲדַ֗ד <S%H1130><s%> and Benhadad וַיַּגִּ֤ידוּ <S%H5046><s%> and they told לוֹ֙ לֵאמֹ֔ר <S%H559><s%> him saying אֲנָשִׁ֕ים <S%H582><s%> There are men יָצְא֖וּ <S%H3318><s%> come out מִשֹּׁמְרֽוֹן׃ <S%H8111><s%> of Samaria

וַיֹּ֛אמֶר <S%H559><s%> And he said אִם־ <S%H518><s%> If לְשָׁל֥וֹם <S%H7965><s%> for peace יָצָ֖אוּ <S%H3318><s%> Whether they be come out תִּפְשׂ֣וּם <S%H8610><s%> take חַיִּ֑ים <S%H2416><s%> them alive וְאִ֧ם <S%H518><s%> if לְמִלְחָמָ֛ה <S%H4421><s%> for war יָצָ֖אוּ <S%H3318><s%> or whether they be come out חַיִּ֥ים <S%H2416><s%> them alive תִּפְשֽׂוּם׃ <S%H8610><s%> take
